column4: hey folks any help getting remote desktop to work?  finally got connection working and can see remote screen but for some reason cannot interract with it. Neither keyboard nor mouse input works. ANY help much appreciated!
you prooobably have it on view only? :)
naw its set to allow me to make changes
no. I mean 2 on same box
some people setup VNC at level of gdm
you just used System->Preferences->Remote Desktop right?
forwarded the port on my router and that it
mm dunno could try cranking up the loglevel on vncviewer I guess
this maybe unrelated but evry time i log out of the machine i'm remoting to it makes me authenticate the shutdown because other users are logged on (even tho they aint!)
gotta go. sorry. does sound interesting
